Class InvertedIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • InvertedIndex

  • public class InvertedIndex
extends java.lang.Object
    The main body of the search engine, holds the inverted index and runs queries on it

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.Set<java.lang.String> stopList
      A set of common words that queries will ignore
      protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<Document>> wordIndex
      Map that holds the actual inverted index, with each word as a key and its value being a Set of each Document it is in

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InvertedIndex(java.util.List<java.lang.String> argList)
      constructor, creates the stop list and instantiates the instance variable, reads the files, makes them into documents, and fills out the inverted index with those documents Expected complexity: O(n^2)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void printIndex()
      Prints to standard out each key and its value in the inverted index Expected complexity: O(n), n being the number of keys in wordIndex
      java.util.Set<Document> query(java.lang.String line)
      Finds a set of documents that contains all of the entered words Expected complexity: O(1), constant time, it is searching through a HashMap

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • stopList

        protected java.util.Set<java.lang.String> stopList
        A set of common words that queries will ignore

      • wordIndex

        protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<Document>> wordIndex
        Map that holds the actual inverted index, with each word as a key and its value being a Set of each Document it is in

    • Constructor Detail

      • InvertedIndex

        public InvertedIndex(java.util.List<java.lang.String> argList)
              throws java.io.IOException
        constructor, creates the stop list and instantiates the instance variable, reads the files, makes them into documents, and fills out the inverted index with those documents Expected complexity: O(n^2)
        Parameters:
        argList - - A list containing the stop list file name and each document file name
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • query

        public java.util.Set<Document> query(java.lang.String line)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Finds a set of documents that contains all of the entered words Expected complexity: O(1), constant time, it is searching through a HashMap
        Parameters:
        line - - A String of each word to search for, separated by spaces
        Returns:
        - A set of the Documents that contain all of the entered words
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • printIndex

        public void printIndex()
        Prints to standard out each key and its value in the inverted index Expected complexity: O(n), n being the number of keys in wordIndex
